message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to offer it for $20,000.
Hi Alice, $20,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $13,000 right now.  What do you think?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your position, $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product and its value.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,000?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $17,000 is still a bit high for my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's my final offer.  Let me know what you think.
